text: <st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> has been <st data-num="1080" class="">fathered</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> the child <st data-num="1080" class="">fathered</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> the <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>: <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> we <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="926" class="">weigh</st> us <st data-num="926" class="">down</st>,

because everyone who has been fathered by God conquers the world.

This is the conquering power that has conquered the world: our faith.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the person who has <st data-num="3528" class="">conquered</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> the one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one who <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>—<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one who <st data-num="3140" class="">testifies</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.
<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> that <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st>,<n id="2" />
the Spirit and the water and the blood, and these three are in agreement.
If we accept the testimony of men, the testimony of God is greater because this is the testimony of God that he has testified concerning his Son.

(The one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2192">has</st> the <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438">himself</st>; the one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>.)<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="3141">testimony</st>: <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>.
The one who has the Son has this eternal life; the one who does not have the Son of God does not have this eternal life.
I have written these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you may know that you have eternal life.
And this is the confidence that we have before him: that whenever we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> in regard to <st data-num="3739 1437">whatever</st> we <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st>, then we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="155" class="">requests</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">sees</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christian</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="264" class="">committing</st> a <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">resulting in</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>,<n id="3" /> he should <st data-num="154">ask</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> God<n id="4" /> will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> to the <st data-num="846" class="">person</st> who <st data-num="264" class="">commits a sin</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">resulting in</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.<n id="6" /> There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="4314">resulting in</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.<n id="8" /> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="2443">that</st> he should <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st>.
All unrighteousness is sin, but there is sin not resulting in death.
We know that everyone fathered by God does not sin, but God protects the one he has fathered, and the evil one cannot touch him.

We <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">lies</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the power of the <st data-num="4190">evil one</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we <st data-num="1492">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1271" class="">insight</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> him who is <st data-num="228" class="">true</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> him who is <st data-num="228" class="">true</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>. <st data-num="3778">This one</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.
Little children, guard yourselves from idols.
